page.title: 16THE FIRST CHURCH OF CHRIST
page.content: Denomination : Protestant Person in charge is a Lay Preacher There've been 20 or more Lay Preachers The church can hold 300 people. {HISTORY}In 1903 a Naval Officer and 4 other Christian Science students started holding informal meetings.This went on for two years when atendance increased, a room was rented, and recognition as a Society was made. March 25th 1909 saw the first service in larger premises. April 28th 1912 saw another move. 1918 war relief rooms opened.1920 temporary wooden building erected. 1922 applied for recognition as First Church of Christ. 1924 all payments complete and dedicated 27th Nov. 1930 permanent Church Edifice built complete by 1931. Present church building built during 2nd world war and used as rest room for H.M. and Allied forces.
